column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Food was fantastic! The veal was falling-apart delicious
column4: and even the fish soup (?) went together much more nicely than expected... loved the mushrooms especially. I am a huge fan of flaky pastries
column6: layered croissant was pretty on point for me. The outside was browned and crispy
column7: and there was a thin layer of almond jam on the bottom of the pastry to add some additional sweetness.
